Title: Requires a candidate for office to file additional information about the candidate's educational background, military service history, and employment history
Summary: Requires a candidate for office to file additional information about the candidate's educational background, military service history, and employment history; provides penalties for violations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to requiring a candidate for office to file additional information about the candidate's educational background, military service, and employment history and providing penalties for violations
